New Records: Luka Modrić made his 180th appearance for the national team against Poland.
Key Match Events: Luka Modrić scored a free-kick goal in the 51st minute to secure a 1-0 victory for Croatia.
Robert Lewandowski hit the post in the 70th minute.
Pre-Game Insights: Andrej Kramarić was not in the starting eleven due to an illness.
Coach Zlatko Dalić made five changes from the starting line-up in the previous match against Portugal, giving Igor Matanović a chance from the first minute.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Croatia dominated the first half with 58% possession and 10 shots on goal compared to Poland's one.
Croatia continues their Nations League campaign in October against Scotland in Zagreb on October 12th and Poland away on October 15th.
